savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.switchRecurrentOnBindOnTitle: Allow autopayments and save payment details
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.switchRecurrentOnBindOnSubtitle: After the payment, the store will <a href=''>save your bank card details to be able to debit money without your participation</>
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.switchRecurrentOnBindOffSubtitle: After the payment, this card will be saved: the store will be able <a href=''>to debit money without your participation</>
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.switchRecurrentOffBindOnSubtitle: This store <a href=''>will save your bank card details</>: next time you won't need to enter them
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.messageRecurrentOnBindOnTitle: Allowing autopayments and saving payment details
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.messageRecurrentOnBindOnSubtitle: By making this payment, you allowÂ <a href=''>saving bank card details and debiting money without your participation</>
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.messageRecurrentOnBindOffSubtitle: By making this payment, you allow saving this wallet and <a href=''>debiting money without your participation</>
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.messageRecurrentOffBindOnSubtitle: By making this payment, you allow the store <a href=''>to save your bank card details</>: next time you won't need to enter them
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.screenRecurrentOnBindOnText:
If you allowed it, your bank card details will be saved for this store and its partners: card number, cardholder's name, and expiration date (everything except the CVC). Next time, you won't need to enter them for payments in this store. 
 
Besides that, we'll link the card (including if it's been used via Google Pay) to the store. After that, the store will be able to send requests for debiting money automatically: then the payment is made without an additional confirmation from you. 
 
Autopayments will continue even after you reissue the card, even if your bank can update the data automatically. You can cancel them and unlink the card at any moment via store's support service.
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.screenRecurrentOnBindOffText:
If you allow autopayments, we'll link the card (including if it's been used via Google Pay) to the store. After that, the store will be able to send requests for debiting money automatically, then the payment is made without an additional confirmation from you. 
 
Autopayments will continue even after you reissue the card, even if your bank can update the data automatically. You can cancel them and unlink the card at any moment via store's support service.
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.screenRecurrentOffBindOnText:
If you allowed it, your bank card details will be saved for this store and its partners: card number, cardholder's name, and expiration date (everything except the CVC). Next time, you won't need to enter them for payments in this store. 
 
You can delete the bank card details during the payment process (tap on the three dots next to the card and select "Remove the card") or by contacting the support service.
savePaymentMethodOptionTexts.screenRecurrentOnSberpayText:
If you allowed it, your bank card details will be saved for this store and its partners: card number, cardholder's name, and expiration date (everything except the CVC). Next time, you won't need to enter them for payments in this store. 
 
You can delete the bank card details during the payment process (tap on the three dots next to the card and select "Remove the card") or by contacting the support service.
